page.title: 17MY LIFE IN EAST MEON
page.content: In January I had my niece from Rome come to East Meon on her way to America.In March another niece came from Australia to settle in East Meon.In the year 1985 I have been very sad and concerned about the Methodist Church which I understand the powers that be talk of closing.But so many other Churches have made it a matter of Prayer.I am simply trusting it will remain open for many years.I attend the Luncheon Club and the Over 60's and find many friend and real kindness.In a weeks time I am having the niece from Rome come again on her way to Canada.
